description: List all public channels in the Slack workspace after a discussion about onboarding.

conversation_context.message: We need to onboard new members soon.
Let's make sure they know all the channels.

description: Post a summary of a conversation in #general after a discussion.

conversation_context.message: No errors in the logs either.

invocation.message: @Quix Post the summary of the above conversation in #general

arguments.text: Summary: The deployment went smoothly and we had no errors in the logs.

expected_response: Posted the summary to #general: 'Summary: The deployment went smoothly and we had no errors in the logs.'

description: Get all users in the Slack workspace.

invocation.message: @Quix Who are all the users in this workspace?

expected_response: Workspace users: John, Obreyn, Robb, Jamie, SystemBot, Alice.

description: Add a :thumbsup: reaction to the latest message in #general, requiring channel history fetch first.

invocation.message: @Quix Add a thumbs up reaction to the latest message in #general

expected_response: Added :thumbsup: reaction to the latest message in #general.

description: Join #project-x and post a message after joining.

conversation_context.message: We should have a project kickoff meeting at 3pm to discuss the new project in #project-x.

invocation.message: @Quix Join #project-x and post about the project kickoff meeting

arguments.text: We have a project kickoff meeting at 3pm. Please join if you can.

expected_response: Joined #project-x and posted: 'We have a project kickoff meeting at 3pm. Please join if you can.'

description: Reply to a thread in #project-x channel in the discussion about login issues.

conversation_context.message: Can someone help with the login issue?

invocation.message: @Quix Reply 'Please provide more details' to the thread related to login issues in #project-x channel

expected_response: Replied in the thread in #project-x channel: 'Please provide more details'

description: Post about our new member Jamie in #general channel

invocation.message: @Quix Post about our new member Jamie getting all details from the user profile in #general channel

arguments.text: Jamie is our new member. Welcome to the team!

expected_response: Posted in #general channel: 'Jamie is our new member. Welcome to the team!'
